Why & What’s @PortaltoBitcoin ?

It’s a bridgeless, custody-free layer that lets you swap native Bitcoin (BTC, Runes, Ordinals) directly with other chains like Ethereum, Solana, etc. No bridges, no wrapped tokens, no middlemen, just pure atomic magic. https://t.co/eFSkjmo3Zt
